main event: A report of an unidentified flying object sighted in San Diego, California on June 15, 1957 as part of Project Blue Book documentation.
interesting points: The sighting was reported years after it occurred, making verification challenging., The object was described as large, bright, and disc-shaped with no sound., The sighting was witnessed by multiple reliable individuals all in the area., The object seemed to exhibit unusual flight characteristics, including hovering and then rapidly disappearing., The report did not include any physical evidence or photographs.
witness description: Numerous reliable and credible individuals from the area.
